metrics.description: Total number of I/O operations in a specified period of time

job.template:
EBS_READOPS1 = data("VolumeReadOps", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)
EBS_WRITEOPS1 = data("VolumeWriteOps", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)
TOTAL_IOPS = (EBS_READOPS1 + EBS_WRITEOPS1)

metrics.description: Number of Bytes read in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_READBYTES = data("VolumeReadBytes", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)

metrics.description: Number of Bytes written in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_WRITEBYTES = data("VolumeWriteBytes", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)

metrics.description: Total number of Read operations in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_READOPS = data("VolumeReadOps", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)

metrics.description: Total number of Write operations in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_WRITEOPS = data("VolumeWriteOps", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"]).scale(60)

metrics.description: Total number of seconds spent by read operations that completed in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_READTIME = data("VolumeTotalReadTime", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"])

metrics.description: Total number of seconds spent by write operations that completed in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_WRITETIME = data("VolumeTotalWriteTime", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"])

metrics.description: Total number of seconds in a specified period of time when no read or write operations were submitted

job.template: EBS_IDLETIME = data("VolumeIdleTime", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"])

metrics.description: Number of read and write operation requests waiting to be completed in a specified period of time

job.template: EBS_QUEUELENGTH = data("VolumeQueueLength", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/EBS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("VolumeId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["VolumeId"])
